oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Jesus Name Tradition service and funeral home movie, 1981 October 7
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Vance, Mary
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording of service in small unknown church. Members dance and handle serpents. Johnny Holbrook handles several serpents. Followed by a funeral service for unknown male member.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region -- Religious life and customs; Dance -- Religious aspects; Funeral rites and ceremonies; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region
Holbrook, Johnny
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Baptism, Funeral, and Wedding home movies
